Santa.

attributes.review: My magic unicorn Percilla convinced me to try out this â€œappâ€. Not long after I downloaded it my toes began poop uncontrollably. And donâ€™t get me started on my eyes. THE HORROR I witnessed was absolutely TRAUMATIZING. My eyes began to bleed and sting when I read his â€œnewsâ€. I would recommend this app to my arch nemesis so they could feel the same pain I did while within 6 feet of this terror house he tried to call an app. I also noticed the most strange activity going on in my freezer after downloading this. Let me just say, that the muffins WERE NOT in the freezer and I was very triggered by this. I think that our beloved Cheeto puff tried and failed miserably, probably all of that artificial orange tan finally seeping into his last few brain cells. When I encounter the creature we call our president, I will be sure to spray some tan all around his eyes where itâ€™s missing, but in the meantime I think Iâ€™m going to bathe all of the orangy cheetoey images out of my brain and do a nice cleanse to completely get rid of the images!

attributes.review: Like many of Donald Trumpâ€™s things he owns - his friends, his wife, his campaign merch - this is clearly made by a foreign country that is intent on stealing your information and selling it for money and politics. This app TAKES FOREVER TO DOWNLOAD BECAUSE IT IS COPYING EVERYTHING ON YOUR PHONE. The scariest part was that I no longer had access to my photos after I downloaded it, and there are pictures of my family on there!! What are they doing with these pictures of my family??? The app itself asks for your phone number and zip code in order to pinpoint your location and track your movements AND THEY HAVE PICTURES OF ME AND MY FAMILY. This is so scary!!! I started getting threatening text messages telling me that Trump knows where I live and knows what I look like and what my family looks like and if I donâ€™t vote for him, then his campaign will ruin us. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! It will find whatever information it needs to threaten you and keep it in another country!!!
